blogPost.excerpt: PixelMixer is a secure video hosting site and we have recently added support for importing your Zoom video recordings so you can save them for later, search their transcripts, edit with our embedded video editor, or share them with others.
blogPost.body: PixelMixer is a secure video hosting site and we have recently added support for importing your Zoom video recordings so you can save them for later, search their transcripts, edit with our embedded video editor, or share them with others.
blogPost.title: PixelMixer - Save, search, and share your Zoom Recordings
blogPost.author: PixelMixer

localize.description: PixelMixer是一个安全的视频托管网站，我们最近添加了对导入Zoom视频记录的支持，这样您就可以保存它们以备以后使用、搜索它们的抄本、使用我们的嵌入式视频编辑器进行编辑或与其他人共享它们。
localize.tagline: 保存、搜索和共享缩放录制

localize.description: PixelMixer是一個安全的視頻託管網站，我們最近添加了對導入Zoom視頻記錄的支持，這樣您就可以保存它們以備以後使用、搜索它們的抄本、使用我們的嵌入式視頻編輯器進行編輯或與其他人共享它們。
localize.tagline: 保存、搜索和共享縮放錄製
